questions.title: Bigfile upload error

comments.body:
I'm still getting..
>Access to XMLHttpRequest at 'http://127.0.0.1:43110/ZeroNet-Internal/BigfileUpload?upload_nonce=2e27717c207b0041e075498c20cbeabc2b308eaf5a9cbcac46cb47484bac61d2' from origin 'null' has been blocked by CORS policy
Adding the header
>req.setRequestHeader("origin", base.href);
Doesn't seem to change anything, why is the origin null?
That's weird....removing "ui_password" from the config fixes the issue.
